name: Philly's Diet
description:
Please play in full screen (click on bottom right in game)

Press space to fly, passing pillars give you points and helps you lose weight but remember to eat carrots along the way and keep in the healthy weight range!!

Extra points are earned if you pass the pillars while healthy

Credits:

Castle assets - Background Elements Redux  (c)  Kenney (www.kenney.nl)

Pillars - Designed by pch.vector / Freepik

Audio - CUTE & AESTHETIC SOUND EFFECTS (c) oopsieaniee (youtube)

and the other assets and illustrations are all done by me
